INTRODUCTION.TEXT#SUMMARY: Designed and delivered 15 full stack web applications over 8 years, including large-scale CMS and MES SaaS enterprise solutions up to 1.5M LoC. Led teams up to 10 people and mentored over 20 juniors/interns.

APPTRACK.TITLE: Cut 30+ mins from part approval process for series production.
APPTRACK.DESCRIPTION: @XL2, I lead a team that launched the first version of an application for a major German car manufacturer within six months. This application reduced the approval and sign-off process in meetings for car parts before series production by at least 30 minutes.

CTR.TITLE: Mange battery components for batch tracking and legal hold.
CTR.DESCRIPTION: @XL2, I lead 2 junior devs to refactor a react app into angular application for managing battery component data. The resulting angular project went on to become the standard setup for at least 5 other XL2 projects.

SMS.TITLE: Manufacturing Execution System with order based OEE-KPI acquisition and reporting
SMS.DESCRIPTION: Designed, implemented, and operated a web based SaaS Solution (web, mobile and TV) for 200+ users across 5 European factories.
